meanings.definition: A highly venomous snake found in Australia and Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The taipans slithered silently through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for taipans when hiking in the Australian outback.
meanings.sent3: The taipans decided to have a slithering race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as venomous as a taipans' bite.
meanings.sent5: The taipans' deadly venom made them feared by all.

meanings.definition: A wealthy and influential business leader.
meanings.sent1: The taipans of the industry gathered for a conference.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a taipans in the corporate world.
meanings.sent3: The taipans' yacht was the envy of all other businessmen.
meanings.sent4: He navigated the business world with the precision of a taipans.
meanings.sent5: The taipans' empire spanned across multiple continents.
